適應症: 成年男性勃起功能障礙。

主製造廠.製造廠廠址: VILLAGE SIKANDARPUR BHAINSWAL, ROORKEE DEHRADUN HIGHWAY, BHAGWANPUR, ROORKEE, DISTRICT-HARIDWAR, UTTARAKHAND. POSTAL CODE-247661, INDIA
